review_text: If you want to wow your dinner guests, whip up a batch of the strawberry sorbet.  The recipe's included in the manual.  You won't be disappointed.  I purchased this item from another online retailer and bought it refurbished.  It works terrific and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
